INVALID_ERROR_CODE.title: Invalid error code
INVALID_ERROR_CODE.message: The error key you gave when you raised an error doesn't exists.

ACCESS_FORBIDDEN.title: Access forbidden
ACCESS_FORBIDDEN.message: You are not granted to access the API url you tried to reach.

URL_NOT_FOUND.title: URL not found
URL_NOT_FOUND.message: The API url you tried to reach doesn't exists.

BAD_FORMAT.title: Wrong format
BAD_FORMAT.message: The server didn't understand what you said.

BAD_REQUEST.title: Bad request
BAD_REQUEST.message: The server didn't expect this request.

DB_ERROR.title: Database error
DB_ERROR.message: Something went wrong with the database.

FILE_NOT_FOUND.title: No such file
FILE_NOT_FOUND.message: The server didn't find the file you asked for.

DIR_NOT_FOUND.title: No such directory
DIR_NOT_FOUND.message: The server didn't find the directory you asked for.

EMPTY_LIBRARY.title: The library is empty
EMPTY_LIBRARY.message: There is no file to add in the library

COVER_ERROR.title: Can't create file
COVER_ERROR.message: The server cannot generate the file for the covers, check the permissions.

PERMISSION_ERROR.title: Not permitted
PERMISSION_ERROR.message: You are not allowed to do this.

RESCAN_ERROR.title: Library isn't ready
RESCAN_ERROR.message: Another scan is running in the background, please be a little more patient

NO_HISTORY.title: Your history is empty
NO_HISTORY.message: You can't play a previous song if you haven't listened to any!

NO_SAME_ARTIST.title: No results were found
NO_SAME_ARTIST.message: Can't find any track by the same artist

NO_SAME_GENRE.title: No results were found
NO_SAME_GENRE.message: Can't find any track with the same genre

NO_SAME_ALBUM.title: No results were found
NO_SAME_ALBUM.message: Can't find any track with the same album

SYNCTHING_ERROR.title: Failed to communicate with syncthing
SYNCTHING_ERROR.message: Check if syncthing is running correctly

USER_DELETE_ERROR.title: Can't delete this user
USER_DELETE_ERROR.message: You can't delete your own account if you are admin

NO_STATS.title: Can't display stats
NO_STATS.message: Use the application for generating stats

BAD_FILENAME.title: The filename is invalid
BAD_FILENAME.message: Change the filename if you want to upload it

FILE_EXISTS.title: File already exists
FILE_EXISTS.message: The file you want to upload already exists

DND_ERROR.title: The drag and drop hasn't been setup
DND_ERROR.message: The administrator didn't configure the buffer folder correctly

FORMAT_ERROR.title: The format provided doesn't have support

DOWNLOAD_LIMIT.title: Your maximum download limith has been reached
DOWNLOAD_LIMIT.message: Select fewer tracks and try again

DIR_CREATION_ERROR.title: Can't create a folder
DIR_CREATION_ERROR.message: The application can't create a folder, please contact the administrator
